title: removing dfg, wtf?
body:
Dfg is honestly not a problem, like a hourglass counters a zed ult a banshees veil and good teamwork counters a dfg assassin. 
you say you will give some champs some buffs to compensate on the loss of dfg that was an essential buy on a fair few ap assassins. But honestly i have no faith whatsoever that they will make it remotely viable in contrast to the loss of the dfg. 

Take ahri for example, late game she has to fish for a charm to be usefull or she cant really healp much. The dfg is what makes people respect ahri so much in the late game. she really needs that item to be able to do her job as an ASSASSIN. without it she will lose the recednt competative viability that she saw with the mana reduction and slight dmg buff to her orb of deception. 

Now take leblanc, no longer has a silence so throughout the whole game she has to be very careful about who she targets and be able to do her job as an ASSASSIN to be useful. without the dfg that becomes increasingly hard to do as her single target burst is while still high diminished by allot. Add that to the amount of cc most rank viable supports bring and their shields/heals.  

There are more that i could talk about but i think i have made my point. 

reconsider this change, 
Sincerely any one who enjoys playing ap assassins that can actually do their job.
